short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make scrambling easier with csTimer and your Gan Robot

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Changelog:
v1.0.2 now opens the tabs upon click of icon when tabs are not yet open.
v1.0.1 added default keyboard shortcut as Ctrl+Shift+Z.
v.1.0.0 initial release

This extension enables the use of csTimer with Gan Scrambler. 
You need a Gan Robot and a Gan smart cube.

How to use:
1. Open tabs for https://cstimer.net/ and https://pof.eslack.org/gan-scrambler/ in the same chrome window.
2. Connect your cube to csTimer and your robot to Gan Scrambler via Bluetooth.
3. When putting the cube to the robot, orientation should be white side up, green side front (near button). It is not required for the cube to be in a solved state, but you should verify if the state of virtual cube on csTimer looks the same the actual state of your cube.
4. Press the extension icon. (Pin it for easy access).

Troubleshooting:
If the scrambling seems to be out of sync, try refreshing both open tabs.
